metadata.title: Endpoint enrichment - Crowdstrike
metadata.description: This playbook will post a comment with endpoint information from Crowdstrike.
prerequisites: CrowdStrike API authentication playbook needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook under the same subscription and under the same resource group.

Compose_image_to_add_in_the_incident.description: This composes crowdstrike image to comment in the incident

Append_to_string_variable_comment_for_de.description: Appends device information to comment variable

Append_to_string_variable_detection_info.description: This appends detection information to comment variable

HTTP-Get_detection_information.description: This gets the detection information from the crowdstrike

Parse_JSON_detection_information_respons.description: prepares json message for detection information

inputs.name: Comment
inputs.value: There are no detections present for this device.

Append_to_string_variable_comment_if_no_.description: this appends text to comments if no detections are present

Condition_if_detections_are_present_for_.description: This checks if detections are present for the host

Create_HTML_table_for_device_information.description: prepares HTML table for device information

HTTP_-Search_for_detections.description: searches the detections based on the filters from crowdstrike

HTTP_-_Get_device_information_.description: This gets the device information from crowdstrike

Set_variable_timestamp_for_past_3_days.description: set variable timestamp for past 3 days to filter detections

Append_to_string_variable_if_no_devices_.description: This appends text to string variable if no devices are present

Condition__to_check_if_device_id_returns.description: This checks if device is present in falcon host or not

CrowdStrike_Base.description: This is to call the base logic app to get the access token and falcon host URL

HTTP_-_Get_device_id.description: This filters the device id by hostname

Initialize_variable_comment.description: This holds the variable comment to include in the incident

Initialize_variable_timestamp.description: Initialize timestamp variable to hold the timestamp

Parse_JSON_Get_device_id_response.description: prepares json for the device id response
